description: Increase melee and magic rating by 25% for 10 seconds

name: Enchant: Power I
description:
Applied on: Chest, Boots, Pants
Power: Block I - Increases your chance to Block with a Shield (0.80% per level)
Power: Block Power I - Increases the amount of damage a Block will mitigate (1.00% per level)
Power: Defence Recipe I - Increases your Armor's defence (1.0% per level)
Power: Knockback Resist I - Decreases the amount of time you get knocked back by abilities that have knockback (3.00% per level)
Power: Resilience I - Decreases the chance that you will be hit by a critical strike (2.00% per level)
Power: Status Resist I - Reduces the chance a negative effect can be placed on you (1.50% per level)

name: Enchant: Skill I
description:
Two hand Weapon, Main hand Weapon, Off Hand Weapon, Shield, Helmet, Gauntlets
Skill: Accuracy I - Reduces the chance an enemy can dodge your attacks (2,50% per level)
Skill: Armor Penetration I - Increases the amount of damage that is unmitigated against your target's Armor (0.80% per level)
Skill: Initiative I - Increases your chance of catching your enemies off guard or surprise them. (1.00% per level)
Skill: One-handed Bonus I - Increases One-hand weapon damage (1.00% per level)
Skill: Two-handed Bonus I - Increases Two-hand weapon damage (1.00% per level)
